src_original: upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittasyaikāgratā ca.
caturthaṃ caturaṅgam:  upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhir aduḥkhāsukhavedanā cittasyaikāgratā ca.
H 66a1; C 330c19 (2.3.2) tatra prathame dhyāne vitarko vicāraś cālambanagrahaṇārthena, samādhis tv eṣāṃ saṃniśrayārthena, prītir ālambanānubhavanārthena, sukhaṃ dauṣṭhulyāpakarṣaṇārthena.
dvitīye vā punar dhyāne teṣu doṣaṃ paśyatīti tatas teṣāṃ vyupaśamād dvitīyaṃ dhyānam.
